title: Infinity Tone Metal Pack 3
description: Collection of 7 instrumental tracks: full compositions, looped versions and looped chunks for each song. All in the style of alternative metal/hard rock. Great for dynamic, action oriented projects - shooters, beat'em ups, etc.
longDescription:
Collection of 7 instrumental tracks from the Event Horizon album by Karol Kosacki: full compositions, looped versions and looped chunks for each song. All in the style of alternative metal/hard rock.

Great for dynamic, action oriented projects - shooters, beat'em ups, etc.

The pack contains the following songs from the album:

Wavelength [full composition - 0:59, one looped chunk]
soundcloud

Prism [full composition - 4:11, looped version - 4:00, eleven looped chunks]
soundcloud

Sunrise [full composition - 3:21, looped version - 3:00, ten looped chunks]
soundcloud

Mirrors [full composition - 4:25, looped version - 4:22, twelve looped chunks]
soundcloud

Gravity Well [full composition - 3:45, looped version - 3:40, thirteen looped chunks]
soundcloud

The Sequence [full composition - 1:28, looped version - 1:25, nine looped chunks]
soundcloud

Free Fall [full composition - 3:09, looped version - 2:53, eight looped chunks]
soundcloud
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio tracks: 77
